title: I Love My Rocky Mountain Horse Trailer Vinyl Window Decal Sticker
features: Made to order in the USA - We use Local Suppliers & Hire Locally
High Quality Vinyl Rate for 6 years of Outdoor Use - NO peeling, NO cracking
Easy to Apply - Detailed application instructions included
NOT A STATIC CLING!! Decal is permanent adhesive. It can be removed,but will not be reusable after removed
description: This is a die-cut decal made of high quality vinyl rated for six years. It is an all-weather adhesive decal that will stay put through all weather, sun and washing. It is designed to be used on the outside of your window or other surface. The decal can be removed, but will not be reusable after removal.   Easy to apply to: ❤ Windows ❤ iPads ❤ Laptops ❤ Binders ❤ Lacquered hardwood ❤ Smooth Walls ❤ Metal ❤ Aluminum  APPLICATION: Designed for outside use. Application directions are included with every decal.  DESCRIPTION: This is an adhesive decal. It comes as shown in the picture. The background is not part of the decal. It is designed to be used on the OUTSIDE of your window or other surface. The decal can be removed, but will not be reusable after removal. It is not a static cling. It is adhesive.  SIZE: We use this same image to sell many different sizes, so please check the size in the Product Details before you purchase.  NickerStickers are made in the great Pacific Northwest using materials from local suppliers and with staff hired from our local community.
